timeline.message:
Migrate CI to GitHub Actions

This migrates the CI testing from Travis to GitHub Actions.

Migrate CI to GitHub Actions

This migrates the CI testing from Travis to GitHub Actions.

Migrate CI to GitHub Actions

This migrates the CI testing from Travis to GitHub Actions.

timeline.bodyText: Nit: name should probably be upper cased
timeline.author: kstich
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+name: ci
+
+on:
+  push:
+    branches: [master]
+  pull_request:
+    branches: [master]
+
+jobs:
+  build:
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+    name: Java ${{ matrix.java }}
+    strategy:
+      matrix:
+        java: [8, 11]
+
+    steps:
+      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
+
+      - name: Set up JDK ${{ matrix.java }}
+        uses: actions/setup-java@v1
+        with:
+          java-version: ${{ matrix.java }}
+
+      - name: clean and build

timeline.bodyText: Looks like these are OpenJDK versions, meaning we lose the OracleJDK from the previous matrix. This shouldn't be a problem, but noting in case someone else knows if we'd need it.
timeline.author: kstich
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+name: ci
+
+on:
+  push:
+    branches: [master]
+  pull_request:
+    branches: [master]
+
+jobs:
+  build:
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+    name: Java ${{ matrix.java }}
+    strategy:
+      matrix:
+        java: [8, 11]

replies.bodyText: I don't think it's a problem.
replies.author: JordonPhillips
